Item.name: Anti-radiation suit
Item.description: A fully enclosed hazmat suit made from fire-resistant fabric, slot for O2 tank and heavy fibres that shield from radiation.

Item.name: Sealed Military Supplies Crate
Item.description: Buy low, sell high. Deliver these water-susceptible crates to the Military outpost for net profit of about 400mk per crate, but be careful! These need to be stored in crate shelves or they will deteriorate every minute.

Item.name: Sealed Research Supplies Crate
Item.description: Buy low, sell high. Deliver these water-susceptible crates to the Research outpost for net profit of about 400mk per crate, but be careful! These need to be stored in crate shelves or they will deteriorate every minute.

Item.name: Sealed City Supplies Crate
Item.description: Buy low, sell high. Deliver these water-susceptible crates to the City for net profit of about 150mk per crate, but be careful! These need to be stored in crate shelves or they will deteriorate every minute.

Item.name: Sealed Habitation Supplies Crate
Item.description: Buy low, sell high. Deliver these crates to the Habitation Outpost for net profit of about 100mk per crate, but be careful! These need to be stored in crate shelves or they will deteriorate every minute.

Item.name: Sealed Mining Supplies Crate
Item.description: Buy low, sell high. Deliver these crates to the Habitation Outpost for net profit of about 100mk per crate, but be careful! These need to be stored in crate shelves or they will deteriorate every minute.

Item.name: Buoyant Duffelbag
Item.description: Duffelbag with layer that adjusts it's buoyancy.

Item.name: Uranium Fuel Rod
Item.description: Rod of dangerous radioactive material, used by humanity as a reliable power source on Europa. Cooling down heated rod takes years under flowing water. Use tongs to deal with these dangerous items.
Rod of dangerous radioactive material, which lasts longer than uranium. Cooling down heated rod takes years under flowing water. Use tongs to deal with these dangerous items.

Rod of dangerous radioactive material, used by humanity as the only reliable power source on Europa. Cooling down heated rod takes years under flowing water. Use tongs to deal with these dangerous items.

Item.name: Tensile Bungee Cord
Item.description: This tensile elastic rope allows climbers to reach tall vertical spaces.

Item.name: Loose Bungee Cord
Item.description: This soft elastic rope allows climbers to slowly descend.

Item.name: Tensile Bungee Hook
Item.description: This tensile elastic rope allows climbers to reach tall vertical spaces.

Item.name: Loose Bungee Hook
Item.description: This soft elastic rope allows climbers to slowly descend vertical spaces.

Item.name: Grappling Gun
Item.description: For use in the exploration of Europa's many dry-cave networks.
